statements: SELECT * from recipes
SELECT recipe_name, rating FROM recipes
SELECT recipe_name, instructions FROM recipes WHERE rating > 4.5
SELECT * FROM recipes WHERE rating < 3.0
SELECT recipe_id, recipe_name FROM recipes ORDER BY rating DESC
SELECT recipe_name, instructions FROM recipes WHERE rating > 4
SELECT * FROM recipes WHERE instructions LIKE '%bake%' ORDER BY rating DESC
SELECT recipe_name, rating FROM recipes WHERE recipe_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200 ORDER BY rating ASC
SELECT recipe_id, recipe_name, rating FROM recipes WHERE rating BETWEEN 3 AND 4.5 ORDER BY recipe_id DESC
SELECT DISTINCT recipe_name FROM recipes WHERE instructions IS NOT NULL ORDER BY recipe_name
SELECT * FROM recipes;
SELECT name, description FROM recipes;
SELECT recipe_id, name, description FROM recipes WHERE recipe_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM ingredients;
SELECT ingredient_id, name FROM ingredients ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT * FROM recipes WHERE recipe_id = 1;
SELECT name, description FROM recipes WHERE recipe_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM ingredients WHERE name LIKE '%salt%';
SELECT recipe_id, name FROM recipes ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT recipe_id, name, ingredient_id FROM recipes r JOIN ingredients i ON r.recipe_id = i.ingredient_id;
SELECT * FROM recipes;
SELECT recipe_name, instructions FROM recipes;
SELECT ingredient_name, quantity, unit FROM ingredients;
SELECT recipe_name, ingredient_name, quantity, unit FROM recipes r JOIN recipe_ingredients ri ON r.recipe_id = ri.recipe_id JOIN ingredients i ON i.ingredient_id = ri.ingredient_id;
SELECT recipe_name, COUNT(ingredient_id) AS ingredient_count FROM recipes r JOIN recipe_ingredients ri ON r.recipe_id = ri.recipe_id GROUP BY recipe_name;
SELECT recipe_id, recipe_name, instructions FROM recipes;
SELECT * FROM ingredients WHERE unit = 'oz';

SELECT recipe_id, recipe_name, ingredient_name, quantity, unit FROM recipes JOIN recipe_ingredients ON recipes.recipe_id = recipe_ingredients.recipe_id JOIN ingredients ON recipe_ingredients.ingredient_id = ingredients.ingredient_id;
SELECT recipe_name, COUNT(ingredient_id) AS total_ingredients FROM recipes JOIN recipe_ingredients ON recipes.recipe_id = recipe_ingredients.recipe_id GROUP BY recipe_name;
SELECT DISTINCT recipe_id, recipe_name, instructions FROM recipes;
SELECT * FROM recipes;
SELECT recipe_name, cook_time FROM recipes ORDER BY cook_time DESC;

SELECT recipe_name, ingredient_name, quantity FROM recipes INNER JOIN recipe_ingredients ON recipes.recipe_id = recipe_ingredients.recipe_id INNER JOIN ingredients ON recipe_ingredients.ingredient_id = ingredients.ingredient_id;

SELECT recipe_name, ingredient_name, quantity, unit FROM recipes INNER JOIN recipe_ingredients ON recipes.recipe_id = recipe_ingredients.recipe_id INNER JOIN ingredients ON recipe_ingredients.ingredient_id = ingredients.ingredient_id WHERE recipes.cook_time < 30;
SELECT category_name, COUNT(category_name) FROM categories GROUP BY category_name;
SELECT recipe_name, cook_time FROM recipes WHERE cook_time > 30;
SELECT DISTINCT category_name FROM categories;
SELECT * FROM ingredients WHERE unit = 'cup';

SELECT recipe_name, ingredient_name, quantity, unit FROM recipes JOIN recipe_ingredients ON recipes.recipe_id = recipe_ingredients.recipe_id JOIN ingredients ON recipe_ingredients.ingredient_id = ingredients.ingredient_id;
SELECT recipe_name, category_name FROM recipes JOIN categories ON recipes.recipe_id = categories.category_id;
SELECT * FROM recipes
SELECT recipe_id, recipe_name FROM recipes
SELECT recipe_name, instructions FROM recipes
SELECT * FROM ingredients
SELECT ingredient_name FROM ingredients
SELECT * FROM recipes
SELECT recipe_name, instructions FROM recipes

SELECT recipe_name, ingredient_name, quantity FROM recipes INNER JOIN recipe_ingredients ON recipes.recipe_id = recipe_ingredients.recipe_id INNER JOIN ingredients ON ingredients.ingredient_id = recipe_ingredients.ingredient_id

SELECT recipe_name, category_name FROM recipes INNER JOIN recipe_categories ON recipes.recipe_id = recipe_categories.recipe_id INNER JOIN categories ON categories.category_id = recipe_categories.category_id

SELECT recipe_name, ingredient_name, category_name FROM recipes INNER JOIN recipe_ingredients ON recipes.recipe_id = recipe_ingredients.recipe_id INNER JOIN ingredients ON ingredients.ingredient_id = recipe_ingredients.ingredient_id INNER JOIN recipe_categories ON recipes.recipe_id = recipe_categories.recipe_id INNER JOIN categories ON categories.category_id = recipe_categories.category_id
